description:
December 10, 2018 / A look at Camden County politics and history, and how they shaped the conviction of Dennis Perry. [Image: Postcard of the Stardust Lodge in Woodbine, Georgia.]

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.
